description: I use it to search up songs in reddit posts and it hasn't failed me yet!
summary: Recognizes all songs, even regional ones. Highly recommended

description: It is very small in size yet works great.... Option of having desktop audio is awesome.... After recognition, you can verify your detection by playing it, this is beyond expectation.... I am really amazed...
It can even save a history of the identified songs!
This is a very good app. It recognizes every music I tried, some even with commentary. 10/10
I'm running this on a pinephone and it works great. Highly recommend!
Been wanting something like this, simple and works great. Thanks!
Really amazed with the performance. Thanks

This app works surprisingly well. Every song I have thrown at it, it has recognised. If you were to try this even with obscure songs, I don't think you would have an issue as I haven't so far. It is also well designed and elegant. I highly recommend. It is basically Shazam for Linux desktop.
The title says it all. I've never had a song not get recognized by this app.

Title says it all! takes about 10-15 seconds to recognize a song
but it works, and it looks great! Good job Dev

The app does not work as far as i can tell. I played guns N roses - Sweet Child of mine, one of the most iconic music sections of all time and the app tells me this is supposed to be DJs Are The New Rockstars-Live Mashup Mix 14 by DJ Godfather. LOL
None of the songs i tried were recognized correctly (via desktop audio)
summary: Sweet Child of mine = DJs Are The New Rockstars-Live Mashup Mix 14?!
